name: Developing Microservices with Openshift Container Platform
speaker: Ugo Landini
description: Abstract: Openshift is an Enterprise version of Kubernetes and Containers are commonly seen as "the new Application Servers": in this talk we'll look at how twelve factor moves @ the infrastructure level with the help of OCP. Weâ€™ll look at Java, Vertx, Spring Boot & Golang code and how we can manage the whole thing form a single pane of glass.
